text: "Hey DJ" is a latin pop/reggaeton song by Latin boy band CNCO. It was released on April 4, 2017. It is from their titular second studio album CNCO (album). There were two versions of the song that were released at the same time. The two singles were a solo pop version, and a reggaeton version featuring additional verses from Puerto Rican singer Yandel.https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/hey-dj/id1222495526?i=1222495532 A remixed version featuring Meghan Trainor and Sean Paul was released on November 9, 2018. ==References== Category:2017 songs Category:2018 songs Category:Meghan Trainor songs Category:Sean Paul songs
title: Hey DJ (song)
